            </a>

           <div class="headline w-100 mb-8">
            <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"Unnamed Feature", "link":"/news/nation-world/2021/03/21/democrats-in-georgia-other-states-to-seek-gun-waiting-periods-after-shootings/"}' href="/news/nation-world/2021/03/21/democrats-in-georgia-other-states-to-seek-gun-waiting-periods-after-shootings/">
             Democrats in Georgia, other states to seek gun waiting periods after shootings
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="subheadline w-100 mb-8">
            Lawmakers in at least four other states  Arizona, New York, Pennsylvania and Vermont  have proposed creating or expanding waiting periods.
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="group w-100 pb-md-12 mb-md-12 flex-md-no-wrap">
         <div class="story-item horizontal-vertical-no-details story w-100 w-md-fill vs vs-md-none hs-md">
          <div class="group column w-100">
           <div class="group text-align-left w-100">
            <div class="headline w-fill mb-8 mr-8 w-xmd-100 mr-xmd-0 order-xmd-last">
             <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"Unnamed Feature", "link":"/life-culture/food/2021/03/19/willas-a-new-tampa-restaurant-wants-to-change-the-local-restaurant-game/"}' href="/life-culture/food/2021/03/19/willas-a-new-tampa-restaurant-wants-to-change-the-local-restaurant-game/">
              Willas, a new Tampa restaurant, wants to change the local restaurant game
             </a>
            </div>

             <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"Unnamed Feature", "link":"/life-culture/food/2021/03/19/willas-a-new-tampa-restaurant-wants-to-change-the-local-restaurant-game/" }' href="/life-culture/food/2021/03/19/willas-a-new-tampa-restaurant-wants-to-change-the-local-restaurant-game/">

               </div>

           </div>

         <div class="story-item horizontal-vertical-no-details story w-100 w-md-fill vs vs-md-none hs-md">
          <div class="group column w-100">
           <div class="group text-align-left w-100">
            <div class="headline w-fill mb-8 mr-8 w-xmd-100 mr-xmd-0 order-xmd-last">
             <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"Unnamed Feature", "link":"/news/pasco/2021/03/21/low-bidder-on-port-richey-dredging-project-gets-tentative-approval/"}' href="/news/pasco/2021/03/21/low-bidder-on-port-richey-dredging-project-gets-tentative-approval/">

             </a>
            </div>
            <div class="media w-50 mb-16 w-xmd-100 order-xmd-first">
             <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"Unnamed Feature", "link":"/news/pasco/2021/03/21/low-bidder-on-port-richey-dredging-project-gets-tentative-approval/" }' href="/news/pasco/2021/03/21/low-bidder-on-port-richey-dredging-project-gets-tentative-approval/">
              <figure>
               <div class="lazy-container" style="background-color:#f2f2f2">
                <img alt="Port Richey City Hall" class="lazy" sizes="(min-width: 992px) 1200px, (min-width: 768px) 800px, 426px" src='data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 9"/%3E' style="transition:opacity 0.5s ease 0.5s;opacity:0" title="Port Richey City Hall"/>
               </div>
              </figure>
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="subheadline text-align-left w-100 mb-8">
            The city manager is taking a deeper look. at the bid by Grubbs Emergency Services.
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="story-item horizontal-vertical-no-details story w-100 w-md-fill">
          <div class="group column w-100">
           <div class="group text-align-left w-100">
            <div class="headline w-fill mb-8 mr-8 w-xmd-100 mr-xmd-0 order-xmd-last">
             <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"Unnamed Feature", "link":"/news/clearwater/2021/03/19/cult-city-tours-apologizes-after-smearing-clearwater-businesses-but-is-here-to-stay/"}' href="/news/clearwater/2021/03/19/cult-city-tours-apologizes-after-smearing-clearwater-businesses-but-is-here-to-stay/">
              Cult City Tours apologizes after smearing Clearwater businesses but is here to stay
             </a>
            </div>
            <div class="media w-50 mb-16 w-xmd-100 order-xmd-first">
             <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"Unnamed Feature", "link":"/news/clearwater/2021/03/19/cult-city-tours-apologizes-after-smearing-clearwater-businesses-but-is-here-to-stay/" }' href="/news/clearwater/2021/03/19/cult-city-tours-apologizes-after-smearing-clearwater-businesses-but-is-here-to-stay/">
              <figure>
               <div class="lazy-container" style="background-color:#f2f2f2">
                <img alt="Ted Reinhard, operator of Cult City Tours, addresses the City Council on Thursday." class="lazy" sizes="(min-width: 992px) 1200px, (min-width: 768px) 800px, 426px" src='data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 9"/%3E' style="transition:opacity 0.5s ease 0.5s;opacity:0" title="Ted Reinhard, operator of Cult City Tours, addresses the City Council on Thursday."/>
               </div>
              </figure>
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="subheadline text-align-left w-100 mb-8">
            The City Council described the name of the tour and the actions of its operator as damaging to downtown revitalization efforts.
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

      <div class="heading mb-8 uppercase">
       <h2 class="fs-md d_fs-sm fw-bold align-left border-top border-dark border-fill border-thin">
        LONG READS
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="tray spotlight">
       <div class="group w-100 mb-20 pb-20 bb w-md-fill mb-md-0 mr-md-8 bb-md-none">
        <div class="story-item vertical-centered-no-meta story">
         <div class="group column w-100">
          <div class="media w-100 mb-16">
           <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"spotlight-collection", "link":"/narratives/2021/03/10/skyway-bridge-suicide-barrier-may-finally-stop-the-ripples-of-loss/" }' href="/narratives/2021/03/10/skyway-bridge-suicide-barrier-may-finally-stop-the-ripples-of-loss/">
            <figure>
             <div class="lazy-container" style="background-color:#f2f2f2">
              <img alt="Andrew Kindt, 41, St. Petersburg, stands on his boat near the Sunshine Skyway bridge. Kindt was fishing in the area seen in the background in August when 25-year-old Mitchell Martin jumped from the bridge. Kindt stayed with the body until first responders arrived. Construction has finally begun on a long-awaited barrier to prevent suicidal people from jumping off the iconic bridge." class="lazy" sizes="(min-width: 992px) 1200px, (min-width: 768px) 800px, 426px" src='data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 9"/%3E' style="transition:opacity 0.5s ease 0.5s;opacity:0" title="Andrew Kindt, 41, St. Petersburg, stands on his boat near the Sunshine Skyway bridge. Kindt was fishing in the area seen in the background in August when 25-year-old Mitchell Martin jumped from the bridge. Kindt stayed with the body until first responders arrived. Construction has finally begun on a long-awaited barrier to prevent suicidal people from jumping off the iconic bridge."/>
             </div>
            </figure>
           </a>
          </div>
          <div class="headline text-align-center w-100 mb-md-4">
           <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"spotlight-collection", "link":"/narratives/2021/03/10/skyway-bridge-suicide-barrier-may-finally-stop-the-ripples-of-loss/"}' href="/narratives/2021/03/10/skyway-bridge-suicide-barrier-may-finally-stop-the-ripples-of-loss/">
            Skyway bridge suicide barrier may finally stop the ripples of loss
           </a>
          </div>
          <div class="subheadline text-align-center w-100 d-none d-md-block">
           A fisherman saw Mitchell Martin plunge to his death. He stayed with the body, said a prayer and  now has forged a connection with the Martin family.
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="group column w-100 w-md-fill ml-md-8">
        <div class="group w-100 mb-24">
         <div class="group w-50">
          <div class="story-item vertical-no-subheadline-meta story mr-8">
           <div class="group column w-100">
            <div class="media w-100 mb-8">
             <a data-tbtcategory="Tray" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"spotlight-collection", "link":"/news/health/2021/03/05/after-tampa-bays-bruising-exhausting-pandemic-year-a-shard-of-hope-for-some/" }' href="/news/health/2021/03/05/after-tampa-bays-bruising-exhausting-pandemic-year-a-shard-of-hope-for-some/">
              <figure>
               <div class="lazy-container" style="background-color:#f2f2f2">
                <img alt="Mark Fernandez holds his mother, Peggy Jagars, while she cries remembering her son, Chuck Fernandez, who died last year because of the coronavirus. On March 1, he would have turned 54." class="lazy" sizes="(min-width: 992px) 1200px, (min-width: 768px) 800px, 426px" src='data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 9"/%3E' style="transition:opacity 0.5s ease 0.5s;opacity:0" title="Mark Fernandez holds his mother, Peggy Jagars, while she cries remembering her son, Chuck Fernandez, who died last year because of the coronavirus. On March 1, he would have turned 54."/>
               </div>
              </figure>
             </a>
            </div>

           <a data-tbtcategory="Navigation" data-tbtevent="link" data-tbtlabel='{"section":"footer", "link":"https://secure.adpay.com/AdEntry.aspx?p=3"}' href="https://secure.adpay.com/AdEntry.aspx?p=3" rel="noopener" target="_self">
            Place an ad

Ive been a Sunshine State resident since I was 4 and likely will never leave, though my favorite season is whenever its coldest. Im a proud graduate of the University of Florida, where I decided I wanted to work for this newspaper and make St. Petersburg my home. I started my career covering local governments in north Pinellas County, then moved to reporting on education. Thrifting is my favorite thing to do, and I spend a lot of time working with a local cat rescue. You can often find me in my hammock at Lassing Park, or sipping earl grey at Black Crow in the Grand Central district. Want to talk about a story? I was born in Salt Lake City, Utah, went to high school in Massachusetts, and came to Florida for college. I graduated from the University of Tampa in 2006. My wife, Meg, is a teacher. Critic","education":[],"awards":[],"books":[],"podcasts":[],"twitter":"helenfreund","bio_page":"","bio":"","longBio":"I write about food and restaurants in the Tampa Bay area. When Im not writing about food or restaurants Im probably talking about food or restaurants, or, you know, actually eating food at restaurants. I was never a picky eater, and never had a chance to be: Growing up in the Pacific Northwest, saying no to things like geoduck sashimi or fiddlehead fern pesto just wasnt cool. Instead, I tried everything, and have ever since. I studied journalism at the University of Washington and cooking at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris. I most recently was the restaurant critic and dining editor of Gambit Weekly in New Orleans - another place where people love to eat and drink. When Im not eating, Im probably scuba diving and tagging along with spearfishers, hoping theyll spear some dinner for me. I love reporting deep on complicated ideas and telling intimate stories that reveal the human experience: a forgotten school shooting victim, a Syrian refugee in a Southern fraternity, a mother-turned-drug smuggler for her dying son. I grew up in a small town in South Jersey and made my way here after attending the University of North Carolina. I was inspired by the vivid stories of people from every corner of the world. It was a natural evolution that I ended up studying photojournalism at the University of Florida. I joined Times Publishing Company in 1998, and began documenting storytelling moments for our daily reports  spot news, features, sports, portraiture, food, fashion, etc. My secret (to success): stay focused on the most storytelling elements while remaining open to the unexpected. the deputy investigations editor at the Tampa Bay Times. I write and edit stories that shed light on wrongdoing. My work has exposed a previously unreported spike in the number of child gun injuries, traced the origins of a fatal power-plant accident and uncovered mistakes at a prestigious childrens hospital. I started my career at the Miami Herald, where I covered crime, schools, Miami City Hall and state government. (Sometimes, the four overlapped.) Before that, I studied at the Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism. I was inspired by the vivid stories of people from every corner of the world. It was a natural evolution that I ended up studying photojournalism at the University of Florida. I joined Times Publishing Company in 1998, and began documenting storytelling moments for our daily reports  spot news, features, sports, portraiture, food, fashion, etc. My secret (to success): stay focused on the most storytelling elements while remaining open to the unexpected. Photojournalism can also be creative, and I believe its my passion to create, along with my personality - adventurous, intense, tenacious, compassionate, confident, patient, curious, evolving - that inspires me to get up each day and do it all over again.","slug":"douglas-r-clifford","native_app_rendering":false,"fuzzy_match":false,"contributor":false,"status":true,"last_updated_date":"2020-10-15T21:57:11.330Z","middleName":"R.","custom_phone":"727-445-4177","twitter":"@cliftimestweet","author_type":"Times Staff Photographer","custom_tagline":"Contact Douglas R.
